head_office_address: The Old School Brewhouse Hill Wheathampstead
eu_initiatives: EU animal welfare legislations eg COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 1099/2009 and COUNCIL DIRECTIVE 2010/63/EU
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
legal_status: Charity and Company limited by Guarantee
goals__remit: UFAW is a scientific and educational animal welfare charity concerned with the welfare of farm, companion, laboratory, captive wild animals and those with which we interact in the wild. UFAW supports animal welfare science, through scientific publications, international scientific meetings, and grants for research and training. http://www.ufaw.org.uk  UFAW is a registered charity in England and Wales no 207996 and a Company limited by Guarantee no 57991.
